landing.needInvitation: You need a valid invitation to access assessments.
landing.tokenAccessDescription: This platform is accessible only through invitation links sent by HR teams. If you have received an assessment invitation, please use the link provided in your email.
landing.supportText: For support with token access issues, please contact:

completion.testCompleted: You have successfully completed your assessment.
completion.resultsSubmitted: Your responses have been securely saved
completion.hrNotified: HR team will review your results
completion.followUp: You will be contacted regarding the results
completion.personalMessage: Dear {{firstName}}, thank you for taking the time.
completion.step3: You will be informed about the process
completion.farewell: You can safely close this window.

test.submitError: Failed to submit results. Please try again.
test.completionInfo: Your assessment data is being processed.

validation.fileSizeTooLarge: File size must be smaller than 10MB.
validation.cvAnalysisFailed: CV analysis failed, but the file will still be uploaded.
validation.checkInvitationLink: Please check your invitation link or contact the sender.

thankYou.title: Assessment Complete!
thankYou.subtitle: Thank you for completing the {{gameName}}.
thankYou.success: Your responses have been submitted successfully and the hiring team will review your results.

steps.review: The hiring team will review your assessment results
steps.contact: You'll be contacted within 3-5 business days
steps.questions: If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to the hiring team

errors.gameCompletedScores: Your scores will be displayed here after the game is completed.
errors.behaviorDataDescription: Detailed behavior analysis data was not collected in this test. In new tests, interaction data will be recorded during the test for more comprehensive analysis.

loading.dataProcessing: Your data is being processed, please wait.

footer.support: Need help? Contact our support team at

descriptions.calisan-bagliligi: This assessment is designed to understand your commitment to the organization and work motivation.
descriptions.takim-degerlendirme: This survey is prepared to evaluate your team's effectiveness and collaboration level.
descriptions.yonetici-degerlendirme: This assessment is designed to understand your manager's leadership effectiveness and management skills.

form.instructions: Please fill out the following information before starting the assessment:

test.submittingDescription: Please wait, your results are being prepared.
test.submitError: An error occurred while submitting the assessment. Please try again.

results.aiDescription: You can chat with our AI assistant for detailed analysis and leadership development recommendations regarding your manager effectiveness results.
results.allExcellent: All areas are at excellent level!
